attributes.action: stop the introduction of the new Specs3 camera system in any part of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is a blatent and unjustifyable waste of money in the current economic climate, inlcuding the fact these networks sound all to similar to the pay per mile road scheme, which we disagree with, and the gross invasion of privacy, as of which we wholely object too.
